item.title: Public Defense - Fully Countering Trusting Trust through Diverse Double-Compiling
item.description: David A. Wheeler's public defense of his disseration, Fully Countering Trusting Trust through Diverse Double-Compiling (DDC). The DDC approach fully counters the 'trusting trust' attack described by Karger, Schell, and Ken Thompson. This presentation was given on 2009-11-23.
item.itunes:author: David A. Wheeler
item.itunes:subtitle: Countering the Trusting Trust attack
item.itunes:summary: David A. Wheeler's public defense of his disseration, Fully Countering Trusting Trust through Diverse Double-Compiling (DDC). The DDC approach fully counters the 'trusting trust' attack described by Karger, Schell, and Ken Thompson.
item.itunes:keywords: trusting trust, countering trusting trust, compiler, compilers, security, Wheeler, diverse double-compiling, DDC, Thompson, Karger, Schell, toolchain, malicious, attack, public defense, dissertation, PhD, GMU, George Mason University, David A. Wheeler
